help.line: STARTING
Press { and } once each--so that both L and R magneto switches are in center position.
Press and hold the s key for 1.5 seconds. It may take several tries before the engine catches.
TAKE OFF
Zoom the view out so you can see the edges of the runway with your peripheral vision.
Easiest, most dependable way to take off: Full throttle, moderate back-pressure on stick to keep
tail engaged w/ ground. Use rudder to steer (tail dragging on ground provides most control authority).
3-point lift-off @ 35 KTS; immediately ease stick forward to avoid excessive climb and loss of airspeed.
More advanced: Gently lift tail @ 35KTS and continue rolling (or in ground effect) through 45-50 KTs before lift-off.
Crashing on takeoff? Check weather--many real Camel pilots crashed taking off with strong crosswind or tailwind.
THROTTLE, BLIP SWITCH, AND MAGNETOS
Real Camel pilots used a combination throttle, magneto settings, and the blip switch to achieve desired power
settings. Throttle provides a limited range of power settings. The blip switch (b) disengages both magnetos and cuts
power totally. Engaging either R or L brake (via keyboard, joystick, or rudder/pedals)
also engages the blip switch. Releasing the brake (or releasing the b key)
releases the blip switch. Engaging only one magneto ({ or })reduces power by about 1/3.
NEGATIVE G - INVERTED FLIGHT
The Camel's fuel system requires gravity to feed fuel to the engine. If you fly inverted or pull negative Gs, the
engine will soon stop. Once you return to upright flight the engine will start again.
APPROACH AND LANDING
Approach speed 48 KTS IAS
Throttle FULL CLOSED, Magneto 1 OFF, Magneto 2 ON, Blip (b) ON/OFF and sideslip as needed to control speed
Touchdown speed: 43-48 KTS IAS
Stall speed: 41 KTS IAS
GUNS
Guns have 400 rounds each, the maximum capacity of the Camel.
Note that guns will not work if AI models are disabled (the bullets
and smoke are AI objects - tracer rounds will appear but they won't move).
Fire with the e key or a joystick trigger linked to /controls/armament/trigger.
Reload guns: Use the menu--you must be on ground and stopped.
